solution_line_template: Her son has {son_teachers} teachers and her daughter has {daughter_teachers}, so together they have {son_teachers}+{daughter_teachers} = <<{son_teachers}+{daughter_teachers}={total_teachers}>>{total_teachers} teachers
Harper has already spent ${total_spent} on {total_teachers} gifts, so she spent ${total_spent}/{total_teachers} = $<<{total_spent}/{total_teachers}={cost_per_gift}>>{cost_per_gift} per gift
